title: So just played with a Bronze 4 Annie who wrecked a former Gold Lux
body: Has only 6ish games on Annie and all are wins with an 8.0 KDA.....they were even Bronze 4 last season too.  And it's not just Annie, but many other champs that suddenly she just appears good with.  Is something like this screaming "boosting" to anyone else besides me?  I mean, she doesn't have any wins with Annie in normals either.  If someone saw my Morg stats they might think "boosting" but then they could see my 19 normal games with her where I practiced.
